summary: A story revolving around a dysfunctional family of 2 brothers who visit their family and discover that their parents marriage is on the verge of collapse,the family is undergoing a financial crunch and much more as the drama unfolds.
cast: Rishi Kapoor|Rajat Kapoor|Ratna Pathak Shah|Fawad Khan|Sidharth Malhotra|Alia Bhatt|Anuradha Chandan|Vikram Kapadia|Anahita Oberoi|Aakriti Dobhal|Rupa Kamath|Pradeep Pradhan|Niti Apurva Patel|Sukant Goel|Aalekh Kapoor|Rahul Arjun Adsul|Carlos Augusto Tavares Canhisares|Elena Roxana Maria Fernandes|Aditya Gunavanthe|Justin|Arbaaz Kadwani|Sanjay Kanojiya|Narendra Khatri|Sonam Nair|Burjor Patel|Olena Paul|Pradeep|Raju|Promod Rampal|Chandrajit Ranavde|Faheem Shaikh|Muskan Khanna Sharan|Arya Sharma|Amarjeet Singh|Amarjeet Singh|Ram Singh|Edward Sonnenblick|Sulekshna|Gary John Tantony
title: Kapoor & Sons
